document_title: Correction for Vangay et al., “Microbiome Metadata Standards: Report of the National Microbiome Data Collaborative’s Workshop and Follow-On Activities”
summary_full: This document is an author correction for a previously published article in mSystems. It corrects the byline and affiliation line of the original article titled “Microbiome Metadata Standards: Report of the National Microbiome Data Collaborative’s Workshop and Follow-On Activities”. The correction provides the accurate byline and affiliation details for the authors.
key_findings: The original article's byline and affiliation line require correction.
The corrected byline and affiliation are provided in this document.
conclusions: The authors have provided a correction to ensure accurate attribution and affiliation information for their published work on microbiome metadata standards.
impact_statement: This correction ensures the accurate representation of authorship and affiliations for a publication concerning microbiome metadata standards, crucial for scientific record-keeping and collaboration.
